mapper.sql: id, name, image, kucun, price, weight, content, categoryid, color, version, title, year, wuxian, chicun, nfc, typec, pool, icon, state, creatime
mapper.select:
SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM phones f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id
and f.categoryid = #{categoryId}
and (f.state = 1 || f.state =3)
ORDER BY f.creatime DESC
SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM phones f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id WHERE f.isshow is not null AND f.state = 1 ORDER BY f.isshow DESC limit 4
SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM phones f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id WHERE f.state = 1 and f.id = #{id}

SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM phones f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id WHERE f.state = 1 and ( c.categoryname like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') || f.name like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') || f.color like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') || f.version like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') || f.content like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') ) ORDER BY f.creatime DESC

SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM phones f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id WHERE f.state = 1 AND f.id IN ( SELECT o.flowerid FROM orders o WHERE o.flowerid IN ( SELECT id FROM phones p WHERE p.categoryid = #{categoryid} ) GROUP BY o.flowerid ORDER BY count( 1 ) DESC ) LIMIT 6
